body_html:
@skye @phawkins

So I think I found it, I had to define the dependency in tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/BUILD.

But I have a question: I am trying to integrate opt into the cpu_ir_emitter of xla. Any pointers as to where I should be putting it in the pipeline?

Thanks.
body_text:

body:
@skye @phawkins 

So I think I found it, I had to define the dependency in  ```tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/BUILD```.  

But I have a question: I am trying to integrate ```opt``` into the ```cpu_ir_emitter``` of xla. Any pointers as to where I should be putting it in the pipeline?

Thanks.
